humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the report, there is metastatic carcinoma present in 1 out of 16 lymph nodes (1/16) in the right axilla. This corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in one of one lymph node (1/1) in the right axilla, as per the pathology report of the sentinel lymph node excision (specimen A). Therefore, the N stage is N1.
